name: Madhu
greetingText: What a beautiful name you have! ✨
wishText: May your life be filled with endless possibilities and joyful moments! 💫
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: I could have sent a simple message...
text3: But then I paused and thought...
outroText: I hope this little surprise brought a smile to your face.
replayText: Click here to relive the magic again!
